name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior FullStack Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and **APIs** for building robust web applications and enterprise-scale solutions. Skilled in leveraging cloud services, particularly **AWS** and **Azure**, to deliver secure, scalable, and fault-tolerant architectures. Extensive experience in **Workflow Automation**, implementing best practices for **Security** following **OWASP** guidelines, and utilizing frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask** to enhance user experience. Proven ability to work in Agile environments and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, consistently contributing to high-impact projects for esteemed clients, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and implemented robust **APIs** in **Python** and **TypeScript** tailored for high-performance **Web Applications** to ensure optimal **User Experience** and **Workflow Automation**.
Engineered scalable backend services using **FastAPI** and integrated them with cloud services on **Azure** for enterprise scale operations, achieving a **20%** reduction in provisioning time.
Developed efficient event-driven architectures with **Celery** and **Redis** for processing **1,000+** financial transactions per minute, enhancing fault tolerance in transaction management.
Deployed and managed microservices using **Terraform** on **Azure App Services**, achieving consistent infrastructure configuration across **3 environments**: development, testing, and production.
Created and monitored data pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for timely regulatory reporting, increasing data accuracy by **30%** per release cycle.
Led comprehensive security assessments aligning with **OWASP** standards, implementing **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for seamless and secure authentication, effectively reducing vulnerabilities by **40%**.
Collaborated in an Agile environment with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration challenges and refine release strategies, leading to a **15%** improvement in team delivery time.

• Developed robust cloud-based web applications using **Python** and **FastAPI** for efficient workflow automation, enhancing user onboarding processes by **30%**.
• Designed and implemented scalable APIs that facilitated seamless communication across systems, ensuring an exceptional user experience while adhering to **OWASP** security guidelines.
• Engineered event-driven microservices utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, achieving fault tolerance and reducing transaction processing time by **25%**.
• Orchestrated the deployment of applications on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code (IaC) to create a reliable deployment pipeline and reduce configuration discrepancies.
• Developed data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, resulting in a **40%** improvement in data flow efficiency and compliance with industry standards.
• Conducted comprehensive security audits and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to bolster authentication and secure access controls, thereby enhancing system security.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams leveraging **Agile methodologies** to ensure efficient release management and maintain enterprise-scale application performance.

• Developed robust **Web Applications** using **Python** and **TypeScript**, enhancing trading operations with a focus on **Enterprise Scale** and **Scalability**.
• Engineered backend services for trade execution and account tracking utilizing **Flask**, **PostgreSQL**, and ensuring **Fault Tolerance** for high-frequency transactions.
• Created and maintained REST APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring optimal **User Experience** through smooth front-end integration and real-time data delivery.
• Integrated **Cloud Services** and aligned solutions with the **AWS Well-Architected Framework**, supporting application scalability and resilience for increasing user loads.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while implementing **Security** measures according to **OWASP** standards.
• Designed and executed comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers to enhance **Workflow Automation** and streamline QA processes for efficient development cycles.
• Employed **Celery** and **RabbitMQ** for job queuing and scheduling, improving backend process management and performance efficiency in handling over **100K transactions daily**.
